## âœ… Title & Subtitle Shifted Right

### ðŸ”§ Changes Made:

1. **Desktop Positioning**: Added `margin-left: 200px` to the `.hero-content-center` class, which shifts the entire hero content (title, subtitle, description, and buttons) 200px to the right

2. **Mobile Responsiveness**: 
   - On tablets (768px and below): Reset to `margin-left: auto` to keep content centered
   - On mobile (480px and below): Also reset to `margin-left: auto` to maintain proper mobile layout

- **Tablet & Mobile**: Content remains centered for optimal readability and user experience
